headline: University Awards: judging criteria
text: HEIs, university departments, professionals working in the HE sector, students and graduates will be invited to nominate institutions, departments and individuals for initiatives, services and excellence. Entries must be focused around a specific initiative, campaign or project, within our outlined categories. All of the categories will be judged by our panel of judges with the exception of Inspiring leader which will be voted for by a poll on the Guardian Higher Education network. Nominees for the Award will be evaluated based on the following criteria:  Innovation Originality  Ability to replicate
